books.title: Poetry
books.author: Mina Loy
books.summary: A collection of poems by Mina Loy.

books.title: Ashenden
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A collection of short stories based on the experiences of an intelligence agent during World War I.

books.title: A Yankee in the Trenches
books.author: Robert Derby Holmes
books.summary: An American describes his experiences in the British Army in the First World War.

books.title: Personal Recollections of Joan of Arc
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: A fictional biography of Joan of Arc from her early teenage years to her martyrdom.

books.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils
books.author: Selma Lagerlöf
books.summary: Nils Holgersson, transformed to an elf, learns the meaning of kindness during his adventures with a flock of wild geese.

books.title: Tartuffe
books.author: Molière
books.summary: A father announces his daughter will marry Tartuffe, a sanctimonious fraud and hypocrite.

books.title: Timon of Athens
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A wealthy Athenian lord becomes poor and friendless after his “friends” take advantage of his hospitality.

books.title: The Wood Beyond the World
books.author: William Morris
books.summary: An adventurer comes to an enchanted castle, where he must rescue a fair maiden from the clutches of an enchantress.

books.title: The Young Visiters
books.author: Daisy Ashford
books.summary: A nine-year-old girl’s humorous depiction of high society, exactly as written in her notebook.

books.title: The Private Memoirs and Confessions of a Justified Sinner
books.author: James Hogg
books.summary: A religious fanatic’s mysterious friend helps turn him into a killer.

books.title: Twelve Years a Slave
books.author: Solomon Northup
books.summary: The account of a free black man kidnapped in 1841 and sold into slavery, from which it took twelve years to free himself.

books.title: The Shore Road Mystery
books.author: Franklin W. Dixon
books.summary: Two amateur slueths endeavor to break up a carjacking ring.

books.title: Histories
books.author: Herodotus
books.summary: Herodotus recounts the history and geography of the ancient world.

books.title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
books.author: Mahatma Gandhi
books.summary: Gandhi relates his life experiences from his birth in Gujarat in 1869 through the Indian National Congress of 1915.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Taras Shevchenko
books.summary: A collection of Taras Shevchenko’s poetry.

books.title: Northanger Abbey
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: A young girl with an overactive imagination comes of age.

books.title: The House on the Borderland
books.author: William Hope Hodgson
books.summary: An account of the terrifying metaphysical haunting of a recluse’s secluded home.

books.title: Winesburg, Ohio
books.author: Sherwood Anderson
books.summary: The residents of a small pre-industrial Ohio town lead their lives amidst a backdrop of pervasive loneliness.

books.title: The Divine Comedy
books.author: Dante Alighieri
books.summary: Dante journeys through Hell, Purgatory, and Heaven in order to receive salvation and to find divine love.

books.title: Two Years Before the Mast
books.author: Richard Henry Dana Jr.
books.summary: A Harvard student embarks on a two-year voyage as a sailor aboard a merchant ship, exposing the harsh conditions of life at sea in the 19th century.
